3 step 1.name: 3 Step number 1
3 step 1.measure: Right foot outside opponent's left foot, overlapping half way.
3 step 1.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 1.defence: Right leg back, Walking stance, inner forearm block to the inside
3 step 1.counter: Left Walking stance, middle reverse punch

3 step 2.name: 3 Step number 2
3 step 2.measure: Right foot outside opponent's left foot, heels overlapping.
3 step 2.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 2.defence: Right leg back, Walking stance, front rising block
3 step 2.counter: Left Walking stance, high reverse open fist strike

3 step 3.name: 3 Step number 3
3 step 3.measure: Right foot between opponent's feet, overlapping half way.
3 step 3.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 3.defence: Left leg back, L-stance, twin forearm block to the outside
3 step 3.counter: Left L-stance, middle reverse punch to the ribs

3 step 4.name: 3 Step number 4
3 step 4.measure: Right foot inside opponent's feet, close to the opponent's left foot.
3 step 4.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 4.defence: Right leg back, L-stance, middle inward outer forearm block
3 step 4.counter: Front leg, middle side front snap kick, stepping back into guarding block

3 step 5.name: 3 Step number 5
3 step 5.measure: Right foot outside opponent's left foot, heels overlapping.
3 step 5.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 5.defence: Right leg back, Walking stance, inner forearm block to the inside
3 step 5.counter: Left Walking stance middle reverse punch, stepping back into a Guarding Block

3 step 6.name: 3 Step number 6
3 step 6.measure: Right foot outside opponent's left foot, heel to toe.
3 step 6.start: Attacker steps back into a Walking Stance Low Block
3 step 6.defence: Right leg back, L-stance, middle knifehand guarding block to the inside
3 step 6.counter: Front leg middle side kick stepping back into guarding block

2 step 1.name: 2 Step number 1
2 step 1.start: Attacker steps back into an L-stance Guarding Block
2 step 1.attack: Step into Right Walking stance, high obverse punch, left low front snap kick
2 step 1.defence: Left leg back, Walking stance, rising block, right leg back walking stance x-fist pressing block
2 step 1.counter: Left Walking stance high twin vertical punch

2 step 2.name: 2 Step number 2
2 step 2.start: Attacker steps back into an L-stance Guarding Block
2 step 2.attack: Right Fixed stance, right middle side punch, left middle turning kick
2 step 2.defence: Right leg back, L-stance, upward palm block, left leg back L-stance, middle waist block
2 step 2.counter: Sliding forward, right L-stance, right side elbow strike

2 step 3.name: 2 Step number 3
2 step 3.start: Attacker steps back into an L-stance Guarding Block
2 step 3.attack: Right low front snap kick, left walking stance high twin vertical punch
2 step 3.defence: Right leg back, Walking stance, x-fist pressing block, left leg back walking stance wedging block

2 step 4.name: 2 Step number 4
2 step 4.start: Attacker steps back into an L-stance Guarding Block
2 step 4.attack: Right walking stance, right high flat fingertip thrust, left middle side kick
2 step 4.defence: Right leg back, Walking stance, left knifehand rising block, left leg back L-stance, right inward palm block
2 step 4.counter: Any leg, depending on distance, front snap kick to coccyx, same leg forward walking stance twin upset punch to kidneys

1 step standard.name: 1 Step - 3 step attacks and defences
1 step standard.defence: All 1-6 defences and counters from 3 step sparring

1 step traditional.name: 1 Step - 3 step attacks, traditional defences
1 step traditional.defence: Any traditional Taekwondo defence and counter. You cannot use the standard 3 step techniques for a given attack

1 step freestyle.name: 1 Step - Any traditional attack and defence
